articles.title: Malawi : Lightning Carnage - 14 Dead , Over 8 , 000 Homes Damaged As Deadly Rain
articles.summary: Malawi is in the grip of a terrifying rainy season that has already claimed 14 lives and left more than 8,096 households counting the wreckage of shattered homes and broken futures. What began as routine seasonal rainfall has quickly turned into a national nightmare. articles.title: Is Palantir Stock Set to Soar Again in the New Year ?
articles.summary: Many analysts -- myself included -- said it was a bad idea to buy Palantir Technologies ( PLTR 2.12% ) in 2025. Today, we have egg on our faces. Palantir stock is up 142% year to date (YTD) as of this writing on Dec. 9, 2025. The company is accelerating its revenue growth and has been deemed one of the big winners of the artificial intelligence (AI) boom.
